title: How to Fly a Helicopter in DayZ

steps.headline: Press Q.
steps.description: Let the rotors spin for awhile. When the rotors are at full speed, hold down Q.

steps.headline: Get to a height that is comfortable for you.
Learn the main controls.
steps.description:
They are:
W= Forward
A= Bank left
S= Bank right
D= Backwards
Z= Land

steps.headline: Turn off the auto-hover.
steps.description: It's now time to control the helicopter manually. Hold W and Q. Remember to always hold Q.

steps.headline: Get used to the controls.
steps.description: When comfortable, turn on auto-hover again.

steps.headline: Hold down Z and slowly land.
steps.description: Well done––you just did the most dangerous thing in DayZ!

text:
Find a helicopter.  Jump into the helicopter.  Press Q. Let the rotors spin for awhile. When the rotors are at full speed, hold down Q. Get to a height that is comfortable for you.  Turn on auto-hover. Just look around. Learn the main controls. They are:
W= Forward
A= Bank left
S= Bank right
D= Backwards
Z= Land Turn off the auto-hover. It's now time to control the helicopter manually. Hold W and Q. Remember to always hold Q. Get used to the controls. When comfortable, turn on auto-hover again. Hold down Z and slowly land. Well done––you just did the most dangerous thing in DayZ!
